definitions: the maintenance of a constant difference in frequency between two or more connected circuits or components.
shortDefinitions: maintenance of constant difference in frequency between two or more connected circuits or components

definitions: the formation of a conducting path for an electric current over the surface of an insulating material.
shortDefinitions: formation of conducting path for electric current over surface of insulating material

definitions: the alignment of the wheels of a vehicle.
the practice of putting schoolchildren in groups of the same age and ability to be taught together

examples.text: Japan allows virtually no tracking or ability grouping before high school
